trans-unit.source: Displays ADO.NET data in a scrollable grid.
trans-unit.target: Visualizza i dati ADO.NET in una griglia scorrevole.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control replaces and adds functionality to the DataGrid control; however, the DataGrid control is retained for both backward compatibility and future use, if you choose.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> controllo sostituisca e funzionalità per il controllo DataGrid; tuttavia, il controllo DataGrid viene mantenuto per compatibilità con le versioni precedenti e per utilizzo futuro, se si sceglie.

trans-unit.source: The DataGrid displays Web-like links to child tables.
trans-unit.target: Il controllo DataGrid consente di visualizzare i collegamenti Web alle tabelle figlio.

trans-unit.source: You can click on a link to navigate to the child table.
trans-unit.target: È possibile fare clic su un collegamento per passare alla tabella figlio.

trans-unit.source: When a child table is displayed, a back button appears in the caption that can be clicked to navigate back to the parent table.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene visualizzata una tabella figlio, viene visualizzato un pulsante Indietro della didascalia che può essere selezionato per tornare alla tabella padre.

trans-unit.source: The data from the parent rows is displayed below the caption and above the column headers.
trans-unit.target: I dati delle righe padre vengono visualizzati sotto la didascalia e sopra le intestazioni di colonna.

trans-unit.source: You can hide the parent row information by clicking the button to the right of the back button.
trans-unit.target: Fare clic sul pulsante a destra del pulsante Indietro, è possibile nascondere le informazioni della riga padre.

trans-unit.source: To display a table in the DataGrid at run time, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.SetDataBinding%2A> method to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A> properties to a valid data source.
trans-unit.target: Per visualizzare una tabella nel controllo DataGrid in fase di esecuzione, utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.SetDataBinding%2A>per impostare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A>le proprietà da un'origine dati valida.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.SetDataBinding%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following data sources are valid: - A <xref:System.Data.DataTable> - A <xref:System.Data.DataView> - A <xref:System.Data.DataSet> - A <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> - A single dimension array - Any component that implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> interface - Any component that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface For more information about the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> class, see [DataSets, DataTables, and DataViews](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Le origini dati seguenti sono valide: - il <xref:System.Data.DataTable>: un <xref:System.Data.DataView>: un <xref:System.Data.DataSet>: un <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager>- una matrice unidimensionale - qualsiasi componente che implementa il <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>interface - qualsiasi componente che implementa il <xref:System.Collections.IList>interfaccia per ulteriori informazioni sul <xref:System.Data.DataSet>classe, vedere [DataSet, DataTable e DataView](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Collections.IList> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> </xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> </xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.DataView> </xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: You can create a grid that enables users to edit data but prevents them from adding new rows by using a <xref:System.Data.DataView> as the data source and setting the <xref:System.Data.DataView.AllowNew%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: È possibile creare una griglia che consente agli utenti di modificare i dati, ma ne impedisce l'aggiunta di nuove righe utilizzando un <xref:System.Data.DataView>come origine dati e impostazione di <xref:System.Data.DataView.AllowNew%2A>proprietà `false`.</xref:System.Data.DataView.AllowNew%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataView>

trans-unit.source: Data sources are further managed by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> objects.
trans-unit.target: Origini dati sono inoltre gestite dagli <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>oggetti.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>

trans-unit.source: For each table in a data source, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> can be returned from the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>.
trans-unit.target: Per ogni tabella in un'origine dati, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>può essere restituito da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> del form</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can determine the number of rows contained by a data source by returning the associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> object's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Count%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, è possibile determinare il numero di righe contenute in un'origine dati restituendo associato <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>dell'oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Count%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Count%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>

trans-unit.source: To validate data, use the underlying objects that represent data and their events.
trans-unit.target: Per convalidare i dati, utilizzare gli oggetti sottostanti che rappresentano i dati e i relativi eventi.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the data comes from a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> in a <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, use the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.ColumnChanging> and <xref:System.Data.DataTable.RowChanging> events.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se i dati provengono da un <xref:System.Data.DataTable>in un <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, utilizzare il <xref:System.Data.DataTable.ColumnChanging>e <xref:System.Data.DataTable.RowChanging>eventi.</xref:System.Data.DataTable.RowChanging> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.ColumnChanging> </xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Because the number of columns can be customized (by adding or deleting members of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>) and the rows can be sorted by column, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.RowNumber%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.ColumnNumber%2A> property values cannot be guaranteed to correspond to <xref:System.Data.DataRow> and <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> indexes in a <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Perché il numero di colonne può essere personalizzato (mediante l'aggiunta o eliminazione di membri del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>) e le righe possono essere ordinate in base a colonne <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.RowNumber%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.ColumnNumber%2A>i valori delle proprietà non è garantito che corrispondono a <xref:System.Data.DataRow>e <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>gli indici in un <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.</xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn> </xref:System.Data.DataRow> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.ColumnNumber%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.RowNumber%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>

trans-unit.source: Therefore you should avoid using those properties in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating> event to validate data.
trans-unit.target: È quindi opportuno evitare di utilizzare queste proprietà nel <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating>convalidare i dati dell'evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating>

trans-unit.source: To determine which cell is selected, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Per determinare la cella selezionata, utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A>

trans-unit.source: Change the value of any cell by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.Item%2A> property, which can take either the row and column indexes of the cell, or a single <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell>.
trans-unit.target: Modificare il valore di una cella tramite la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.Item%2A>proprietà, che può risultare entrambi gli indici di riga e colonna della cella, oppure un singolo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: Monitor the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCellChanged> event to detect when the user selects another cell.
trans-unit.target: Monitoraggio di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCellChanged>evento per rilevare quando l'utente seleziona un'altra cella.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCellChanged>

trans-unit.source: To determine which part of the control the user clicked, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTest%2A> method in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> event.
trans-unit.target: Per determinare quale parte del controllo selezionato dall'utente, utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTest%2A>metodo il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTest%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTest%2A> method returns a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTestInfo> object, which contains the row and column of a clicked area.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTest%2A>metodo restituisce un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTestInfo>oggetto, che contiene la riga e colonna all'area selezionata.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTestInfo> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTest%2A>

trans-unit.source: To manage the appearance of the control at run time, several properties for setting the color and caption attributes are available, including the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CaptionForeColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CaptionBackColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CaptionFont%2A>, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Per gestire l'aspetto del controllo in fase di esecuzione, sono disponibili, incluse diverse proprietà per impostare gli attributi di colore e la didascalia di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CaptionForeColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CaptionBackColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CaptionFont%2A>e così via.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CaptionFont%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CaptionBackColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CaptionForeColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The appearance of the displayed grid (or grids) can be further modified by creating <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> objects and adding them to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>, which is accessed through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: L'aspetto della griglia visualizzata (o griglie) può essere modificato ulteriormente creando <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>oggetti e aggiungendoli al <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>, cui si accede mediante la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A> is set to a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> containing three <xref:System.Data.DataTable> objects, you can add three <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> objects to the collection, one for each table.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A>è impostata su un <xref:System.Data.DataSet>contenente tre <xref:System.Data.DataTable>oggetti, è possibile aggiungere tre <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>oggetti alla raccolta, uno per ogni tabella.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: To synchronize each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> object with a <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> to the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> of the <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: Per sincronizzare ogni <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>oggetto con un oggetto <xref:System.Data.DataTable>impostare la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>per <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.</xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>

trans-unit.source: For more information about binding to an array of objects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sull'associazione a una matrice di oggetti, vedere il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To create a customized view of a table, create an instance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn> class and add the object to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection> accessed through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Per creare una visualizzazione personalizzata di una tabella, creare un'istanza di un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn>o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn>classe e aggiungere l'oggetto per il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>si accede tramite il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn>

trans-unit.source: Both classes inherit from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>.
trans-unit.target: Entrambe le classi ereditano da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: For each column style, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A> to the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A> of a column that you want to show in the grid.
trans-unit.target: Per ogni stile di colonna, impostare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A>per il <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A>di una colonna che si desidera visualizzare nella griglia.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A>

trans-unit.source: To hide a column, set its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A> to something other than a valid <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Per nascondere una colonna, impostare il relativo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A>diverso da un <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A>.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A> valido</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A>

trans-unit.source: To format the text of a column, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> to one of the values found in [Formatting Types](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per formattare il testo di una colonna, impostare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A>proprietà del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn>a uno dei valori disponibili nel [formattazione dei tipi di](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [stringhe di formato di ora e Data personalizzata](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A>

trans-unit.source: To bind the DataGrid to a strongly typed array of objects, the object type must contain public properties.
trans-unit.target: Per associare il controllo DataGrid a una matrice fortemente tipizzata di oggetti, il tipo di oggetto deve contenere le proprietà pubbliche.

trans-unit.source: To create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> that displays the array, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `typename[]` where `typename` is replaced by the name of the object type.
trans-unit.target: Per creare un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>che consente di visualizzare la matrice, impostare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà `typename[]` dove `typename` viene sostituito dal nome del tipo di oggetto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>

trans-unit.source: Also note that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> property is case-sensitive; the type name must be matched exactly.
trans-unit.target: Si noti inoltre che il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>proprietà distinzione maiuscole/minuscole; il nome del tipo deve corrispondere esattamente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> property for an example.
trans-unit.target: Vedere il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>proprietà per un esempio.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also bind the DataGrid to an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>.
trans-unit.target: È anche possibile associare il controllo DataGrid a una <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>.</xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>

trans-unit.source: A feature of the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> is that it can contain objects of multiple types, but the DataGrid can only bind to such a list when all items in the list are of the same type as the first item.
trans-unit.target: Una funzionalità di <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>che può contenere oggetti di più tipi, ma il controllo DataGrid può associarsi solo a tale elenco quando tutti gli elementi nell'elenco sono dello stesso tipo come primo elemento.</xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>

trans-unit.source: This means that all objects must either be of the same type, or they must inherit from the same class as the first item in the list.
trans-unit.target: Ciò significa che tutti gli oggetti devono essere dello stesso tipo o ereditano dalla classe stesso come il primo elemento nell'elenco.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the first item in a list is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>, the second item could be a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> (which inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>).
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se il primo elemento in un elenco è un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>, il secondo elemento potrebbe essere un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>(che eredita da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>

trans-unit.source: If, on the other hand, the first item is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>, the second object cannot be a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>.
trans-unit.target: Se, invece, il primo elemento è un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>secondo oggetto non può essere un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: Further, the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> must have items in it when it is bound.
trans-unit.target: Inoltre, il <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>devono avere gli elementi in essa contenuti, quando è associato.</xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>

trans-unit.source: An empty <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> will result in an empty grid.
trans-unit.target: Un oggetto vuoto <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>comporterà una griglia vuota.</xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>

trans-unit.source: In addition, the objects in the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> must contain public properties.
trans-unit.target: Inoltre, gli oggetti di <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>deve contenere le proprietà pubbliche.</xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>

trans-unit.source: When binding to an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> to "ArrayList" (the type name).
trans-unit.target: Quando si associa a un <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>, impostare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>su "ArrayList" (il nome del tipo).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> </xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>

trans-unit.source: For each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>, you can set color and caption attributes that override the settings for the DataGrid control.
trans-unit.target: Per ogni <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>, è possibile impostare colori e gli attributi di didascalia che sostituiscono le impostazioni per il controllo DataGrid.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>

trans-unit.source: However, if those properties are not set, the settings for the control are used by default.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, se non vengono impostate le proprietà, per impostazione predefinita vengono utilizzate le impostazioni per il controllo.

trans-unit.source: The following properties can be overridden by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> properties: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.AllowSorting%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.AlternatingBackColor%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.BackColor%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.ColumnHeadersVisible%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.ForeColor%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.GridLineColor%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.GridLineStyle%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.HeaderBackColor%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.HeaderFont%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.HeaderForeColor%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.LinkColor%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.PreferredColumnWidth%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.PreferredRowHeight%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.ReadOnly%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.RowHeadersVisible%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.RowHeaderWidth%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.SelectionBackColor%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.SelectionForeColor%2A> To customize the appearance of individual columns, add <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>, which is accessed through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.GridColumnStyles%2A> property of each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>.
trans-unit.target: Le seguenti proprietà possono essere sostituite da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>proprietà:- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.AllowSorting%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.AlternatingBackColor%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.BackColor%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.ColumnHeadersVisible%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.ForeColor%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.GridLineColor%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.GridLineStyle%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.HeaderBackColor%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.HeaderFont%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.HeaderForeColor%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.LinkColor%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.PreferredColumnWidth%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.PreferredRowHeight%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.ReadOnly%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.RowHeadersVisible%2A>- trans-unit.source: To synchronize each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> with a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> in the <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A> to the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A> of a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>.
trans-unit.target: Per sincronizzare ciascuna <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>con un <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> <xref:System.Data.DataTable>impostare <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A>per l' <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A>un <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: When constructing a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>, you can also set a formatting string that specifies how the column displays data.
trans-unit.target: Quando si crea un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>, è anche possibile impostare una stringa di formattazione che specifica la modalità di visualizzazione dati della colonna.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify that the column use a short-date format to display dates contained in the table.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, è possibile specificare che la colonna utilizza un formato di data breve per visualizzare le date contenute nella tabella.

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Always create <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects and add them to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> before adding <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > Sempre creare <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>oggetti e aggiungerli alla <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>prima di aggiungere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>oggetti al <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: When you add an empty <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> with a valid <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> value to the collection, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects are automatically generated for you.
trans-unit.target: Quando si aggiunge un oggetto vuoto <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>con un valore valido <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>valore alla raccolta, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>gli oggetti vengono generati automaticamente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>

trans-unit.source: Consequently, an exception will be thrown if you try to add new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects with duplicate <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> values to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Di conseguenza, verrà generata un'eccezione se si tenta di aggiungere nuovi <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>oggetti con <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>valori a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> di duplicati</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control replaces and adds functionality to the DataGrid control; however, the DataGrid control is retained for both backward compatibility and future use, if you choose.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controllo sostituisca e funzionalità per il controllo DataGrid; tuttavia, il controllo DataGrid viene mantenuto per compatibilità con le versioni precedenti e per utilizzo futuro, se si sceglie.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Differences Between the Windows Forms DataGridView and DataGrid Controls](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [differenze tra il Windows Form controlli DataGridView e DataGrid](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: To populate a newly created <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> control, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A> property to a valid source, such as a <xref:System.Data.DataView>, <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, or <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager>.
trans-unit.target: Per popolare un oggetto appena creato <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>controllare, impostare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A>proprietà a un'origine valida, ad esempio un <xref:System.Data.DataView>, <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, o <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager>.</xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> </xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.DataView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether navigation is allowed.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se è consentita la navigazione.

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `false`, links to child tables are not shown.
trans-unit.target: Se questa proprietà è impostata su `false`, non vengono visualizzati i collegamenti alle tabelle figlio.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if navigation is allowed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se l'esplorazione è consentita; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AllowNavigation*> property has changed.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AllowNavigation*>proprietà è stata modificata.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AllowNavigation*>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AllowNavigation%2A> property is set to `false`, then no links to child tables are shown.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AllowNavigation%2A>è impostata su `false`, quindi viene visualizzato alcun collegamento alle tabelle figlio.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AllowNavigation%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the grid can be resorted by clicking on a column header.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se la griglia può essere riordinata facendo clic su un'intestazione di colonna.

trans-unit.source: This property is overridden by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.AllowSorting%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property if there is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> currently in effect for the control.
trans-unit.target: Viene eseguito l'override di questa proprietà per il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.AllowSorting%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà se è presente un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>attualmente in vigore per il controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.AllowSorting%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If sorting is allowed, clicking on a column header will sort the table data by that column.
trans-unit.target: Se è consentito l'ordinamento, fare clic su un'intestazione di colonna ordinerà i dati della tabella in base alla colonna.

trans-unit.source: You can also sort using an expression for a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>.
trans-unit.target: È inoltre possibile ordinare utilizzando un'espressione per un <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn>

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Expression%2A> for details on creating a sort expression.
trans-unit.target: Vedere <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Expression%2A>per informazioni dettagliate sulla creazione di un'espressione di ordinamento.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Expression%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> is bound to a <xref:System.Data.DataView>, you can set a custom sort for the table using the <xref:System.Data.DataView> class's <xref:System.Data.DataView.Sort%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>è associato a un <xref:System.Data.DataView>, è possibile impostare un ordinamento personalizzato per la tabella utilizzando il <xref:System.Data.DataView>della classe <xref:System.Data.DataView.Sort%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Data.DataView.Sort%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataView> </xref:System.Data.DataView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Similarly, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> is bound to a <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager>, each table in the <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> can have a custom sort by setting the <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager.DataViewSettings%2A> class's <xref:System.Data.DataViewSetting.Sort%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: In modo analogo, se il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>è associato a un <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager>, ogni tabella il <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager>può avere un ordinamento personalizzato tramite l'impostazione di <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager.DataViewSettings%2A>della classe <xref:System.Data.DataViewSetting.Sort%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Data.DataViewSetting.Sort%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataViewManager.DataViewSettings%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> </xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if columns can be sorted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se è possono ordinare le colonne; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color of odd-numbered rows of the grid.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il colore di sfondo delle righe dispari della griglia.

trans-unit.source: By default, both the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackColor%2A> and the AlternatingBackColor properties are set to the same color.
trans-unit.target: Per impostazione predefinita, sia il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackColor%2A>e le proprietà AlternatingBackColor vengono impostate sullo stesso colore.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackColor%2A> property affects only even-numbered rows, while setting the AlternatingBackColor affects only odd-numbered rows.
trans-unit.target: L'impostazione di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackColor%2A>proprietà influisce solo righe pari, mentre l'impostazione di AlternatingBackColor interessa solo le righe dispari.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that represents the alternating background color.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> che rappresenta il colore di sfondo alternativi.

trans-unit.source: The default is the system color for windows (<xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Window*>).
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è il colore di sistema per windows (<xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Window*>).</xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Window*>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Back" name="Back" href=""></xref> button on a child table is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando il <xref uid="langword_csharp_Back" name="Back" href=""> </xref> si fa clic sul pulsante in una tabella figlio.

trans-unit.source: The `Back` button becomes visible when a child table is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Il `Back` pulsante diventa visibile solo quando viene visualizzata una tabella figlio.

trans-unit.source: Clicking the button will cause the grid to display the parent table.
trans-unit.target: Fare clic sul pulsante, la griglia visualizzare la tabella padre.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color of even-numbered rows of the grid.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il colore di sfondo delle righe pari della griglia.

trans-unit.source: Whereas the BackColor property determines the color of rows in the grid, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundColor%2A> determines the color of the nonrow area, which is only visible when the grid is scrolled to the bottom, or if only a few rows are contained in the grid.
trans-unit.target: Mentre la proprietà BackColor determina il colore delle righe nella griglia, il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundColor%2A>determina il colore dell'area senza righe, che è visibile solo quando si scorre la griglia nella parte inferiore, o se solo alcune righe sono contenute nella griglia.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, both the BackColor and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AlternatingBackColor%2A> properties are set to the same color.
trans-unit.target: Per impostazione predefinita, entrambi il colore di sfondo e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AlternatingBackColor%2A>proprietà vengono impostate sullo stesso colore.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AlternatingBackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting the BackColor property affects only even-numbered rows, while setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AlternatingBackColor%2A> affects only odd-numbered rows.
trans-unit.target: Impostare il colore di sfondo proprietà influisce sole righe pari, mentre se si imposta la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AlternatingBackColor%2A>influisce sulle righe solo dispari.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AlternatingBackColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that represents the color of rows in the grid.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> che rappresenta il colore delle righe nella griglia.

trans-unit.source: The default is the system color for windows (<xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Window*>).
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è il colore di sistema per windows (<xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Window*>).</xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Window*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color of the non-row area of the grid.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il colore dell'area senza righe della griglia.

trans-unit.source: The BackgroundColor determines the color of the nonrow area of the grid, which is only visible when no table is displayed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>, or if the grid is scrolled to the bottom, or if only a few rows are contained in the grid.
trans-unit.target: Il BackgroundColor determina il colore dell'area senza righe della griglia, che è visibile solo quando è presente alcuna tabella il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>, o se si scorre la griglia verso il basso, o se solo alcune righe sono contenute nella griglia.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that represents the color of the grid's background.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> che rappresenta il colore di sfondo della griglia.

trans-unit.source: The default is the <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.AppWorkspace*> color.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è il <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.AppWorkspace*>colore.</xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.AppWorkspace*>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundColor*> has changed.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundColor*>è stata modificata.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundColor*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: This member is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: Questo membro non è significativo per questo controllo.

trans-unit.source: The background image associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: Immagine di sfondo associata al controllo.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundImage*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando il valore di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundImage*>le modifiche alle proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundImage*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundImage%2A> property is not meaningful for this control, although you can change its value and handle the BackgroundImageChanged event to detect the change.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundImage%2A>proprietà non è significativa per questo controllo, sebbene sia possibile modificarne il valore e gestire l'evento BackgroundImageChanged per rilevare la modifica.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundImage%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: This member is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: Questo membro non è significativo per questo controllo.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundImageLayout*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando il valore di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundImageLayout*>le modifiche alle proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundImageLayout*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundImageLayout%2A> property is not meaningful for this control, although you can change its value and handle the BackgroundImageLayoutChanged event to detect the change.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundImageLayout%2A>proprietà non è significativa per questo controllo, sebbene sia possibile modificarne il valore e gestire l'evento BackgroundImageLayoutChanged per rilevare la modifica.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundImageLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Attempts to put the grid into a state where editing is allowed.
trans-unit.target: Tenta di impostare la griglia in uno stato in cui è consentita la modifica.

trans-unit.source: The grid will deny edit requests if the user already started typing into a cell.
trans-unit.target: Se l'utente ha già iniziato digitando in una cella, la griglia rifiuterà le richieste di modifica.

trans-unit.source: In that case, the BeginEdit method will return `false`.
trans-unit.target: In tal caso, il metodo di BeginEdit restituirà `false`.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref> to edit.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle"></xref> to edit.

trans-unit.source: The number of the row to edit.
trans-unit.target: Il numero di riga da modificare.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the method is successful; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il metodo ha esito positivo; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Begins the initialization of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> that is used on a form or used by another component.
trans-unit.target: Avvia l'inizializzazione di un <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"> </xref> utilizzato in un form o da un altro componente.

trans-unit.source: The initialization occurs at run time.
trans-unit.target: L'inizializzazione avviene in fase di esecuzione.

trans-unit.source: The Visual Studio design environment uses this method to start the initialization of a component that is used on a form or used by another component.
trans-unit.target: Ambiente di progettazione di Visual Studio Usa questo metodo per avviare l'inizializzazione di un componente utilizzato in un form o da un altro componente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.EndInit%2A> method ends the initialization.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.EndInit%2A>metodo termina l'inizializzazione.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.EndInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Using the BeginInit and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.EndInit%2A> methods prevents the control from being used before it is fully initialized.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzo di BeginInit e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.EndInit%2A>metodi impedisce il controllo venga utilizzato prima che il completamento dell'inizializzazione.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.EndInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the grid's border style.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta lo stile del bordo della griglia.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Uno del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BorderStyle"> </xref> valori di enumerazione.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_FixedSingle" name="FixedSingle" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_FixedSingle" name="FixedSingle" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BorderStyle*> has changed.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BorderStyle*>è stata modificata.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BorderStyle*>

trans-unit.source: Possible values include `None`, `FixedSingle`, and `Fixed3D`.
trans-unit.target: I valori possibili includono `None`, `FixedSingle`, e `Fixed3D`.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Cancels the current edit operation and rolls back all changes.
trans-unit.target: Annulla l'operazione di modifica corrente e il rollback di tutte le modifiche.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color of the caption area.

trans-unit.source: If CaptionVisible is `false`, the **Back** button, **ParentRow** button, and caption will not be seen.
trans-unit.target: Se CaptionVisible `false`, **nuovamente** pulsante, **ParentRow** pulsante e la didascalia non saranno visibili.

trans-unit.source: Because navigation is limited, links to child tables will also not be visible and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AllowNavigation%2A> will be set to `None`.

trans-unit.source: Only the following properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> should be set: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Role%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Description%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Name%2A> All other properties are handled by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> itself.
